summary: Hyperscalers are aggressively increasing AI infrastructure investments, with Meta projecting $35-40B in 2024 capex (primarily for AI), Microsoft and Google accelerating data center buildouts, and AWS expanding GPU capacity. GPU rental prices remain stable at $3.22/hr despite minor adjustments, reflecting sustained demand. Anticipation for GPT-5 (mid-2024) and Gemini 2 further fuels market optimism.
